attributes.action: Drop the fuel tax levy given the swift increase due to the Ukraine crisis.
attributes.additional_details: Reduce the tax levy to reflect what the average UK household can afford. Now that the UK Government had rightly supported the banishment of Russian fuel the UK population shouldn't suffer increased prices largely based on tax in proportion to the increase of the price of a barrel of oil.
attributes.background: Drop the fuel tax levy to support the UK citizens; as barrel of oil is increasing due to the crisis so does the amount of tax revenue the government collects. The wages of UK citizens are not, after the Pandemic this is another blow to UK income.

rejection.details:
